content: It's hard to find the API endpoint on how to change a username because the heading is "Change User Identifier": https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.3/api/native-api.html#change-user-identifier
good catch! do you think that "Change Username (User Identifier)" would be an improvement? that way the more findable term is used, but the existing term is also available for those familiar.
Meh, maybe. I'm also fine with just changing it to "username".
